name: Graveyard shift (itch) (WhySoup)
description:
You're an aspiring necromancer graveyard keeper and you just procured your first plot of land! The place is a little run down but I'm sure you can get a little help from down below...

Use the shovel to dig graves, and keep your occupants happy to get more resources to improve the graveyard!

Controls:
  • WASD: move around
  • Right mouse button: Pick up and place items
  • Left mouse button: dig grave (while holding shovel)

- Kenney Gamejam 2022 submission -

Made by WhySoup and Greenclonk, be sure to rate the game!
